transcripts.text: Excuse me for a moment, I know that it is inappropriate, maybe you are in a hurry?  No, not at all.  Even better, we are doing something now when we ask people.  Tell me, in 1998, if you could revive one man, just one, who would that man be?

Only Stalin.  Only Stalin.  Today, Stalin is very needed, not only in our country, but in the whole of Europe, in the whole world.  Every socialist country that has collapsed, has come to something.  It came to a difficult poverty, unemployment, they have nothing to eat and drink.  I would return Stalin.  That would settle everything for Stalin.  Why Stalin?  Because I look a lot like Stalin.  I am the same Stalin.  I even think that we have some connection with Stalin.
And how do you think Stalin would solve this situation in Croatia, politically, geopolitically, socially?

A firm hand, kicks and locks.  All the locks need to be revived, they need to be redone again.  If the lock is four times, it needs to be redone four more times.  The Goli Otok needs to be opened like the Goli Otok and only discipline is needed.  Discipline, discipline and kick, kick.
Tell me, it is known for one Croatian phrase, kick came out of heaven.  Are you a supporter of that?

Batina came from heaven.  I think that heaven is Batina.  I think that they beat her in heaven.  I was not in heaven, God forbid that I end up in heaven, but Batina is the mother, Batina is everything.  I didn't get Batina.  I would take you here with a knife.
